item.title: Has the Scottish civil service become too politicised?
item.description:
https://mercinon.wordpress.com/2020/06/04/has-the-scottish-civil-service-become-too-politicised/

Ms Evans is a civil servant. Civil servants are the paid employees of the state. They are subject to a Civil Service Code which sets out the standards expected of them. The UK government and the devolved administrations share a unified civil service but each has a separate code for its particular circumstances. You can find the Scottish Civil Service codeÂ here.
